title: Your local changes to the following files would be overwritten by merge: 	.gitattributes
body:
Recent changes in git (I guess) started to cause some extensions testing to fail

<details>
<summary>hirni and ukbiobank (only?)</summary> 

```shell
03/cron/20211003T024507/7ddf18a/github-test-datalad_hirni-master-285-failed/2_test (datalad-git-annex-latest).txt
03/cron/20211003T024507/7ddf18a/github-test-datalad_hirni-master-285-failed/test (datalad-git-annex-latest)/11_datalad_hirni tests.txt
03/cron/20211003T030108/7ddf18a/github-test-datalad_ukbiobank-master-285-failed/2_test (datalad-git-annex-latest).txt
03/cron/20211003T030108/7ddf18a/github-test-datalad_ukbiobank-master-285-failed/test (datalad-git-annex-latest)/10_datalad_ukbiobank tests.txt
03/cron/20211003T030527/7ddf18a/github-test-datalad_ukbiobank-maint-285-failed/2_test (datalad-git-annex-latest).txt
03/cron/20211003T030527/7ddf18a/github-test-datalad_ukbiobank-maint-285-failed/test (datalad-git-annex-latest)/10_datalad_ukbiobank tests.txt
04/cron/20211004T024555/7ddf18a/github-test-datalad_hirni-master-286-failed/2_test (datalad-git-annex-latest).txt
04/cron/20211004T024555/7ddf18a/github-test-datalad_hirni-master-286-failed/test (datalad-git-annex-latest)/11_datalad_hirni tests.txt
04/cron/20211004T030058/7ddf18a/github-test-datalad_ukbiobank-master-286-failed/2_test (datalad-git-annex-latest).txt
04/cron/20211004T030058/7ddf18a/github-test-datalad_ukbiobank-master-286-failed/test (datalad-git-annex-latest)/10_datalad_ukbiobank tests.txt
04/cron/20211004T030521/7ddf18a/github-test-datalad_ukbiobank-maint-286-failed/2_test (datalad-git-annex-latest).txt
04/cron/20211004T030521/7ddf18a/github-test-datalad_ukbiobank-maint-286-failed/test (datalad-git-annex-latest)/10_datalad_ukbiobank tests.txt

```
</details>

see e.g. https://github.com/datalad/datalad-extensions/runs/3786214340?check_suite_focus=true

```
...
File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.7.12/x64/lib/python3.7/site-packages/datalad/dataset/gitrepo.py", line 321, in call_git
    read_only=read_only)
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.7.12/x64/lib/python3.7/site-packages/datalad/dataset/gitrepo.py", line 262, in _call_git
    env=env)
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.7.12/x64/lib/python3.7/site-packages/datalad/cmd.py", line 172, in run
    **results,
datalad.support.exceptions.CommandError: CommandError: 'git -c diff.ignoreSubmodules=none merge -m 'Merge incoming' --allow-unrelated-histories incoming-native' failed with exitcode 128 under /tmp/datalad_temp_test_base_jms95ah [err: 'error: Your local changes to the following files would be overwritten by merge:
	.gitattributes
Please commit your changes or stash them before you merge.
Aborting']
```

WTF externals:

```
2021-10-04T03:07:14.7193816Z ## dependencies
2021-10-04T03:07:14.7194750Z   - annexremote: 1.5.0
2021-10-04T03:07:14.7195362Z   - appdirs: 1.4.4
2021-10-04T03:07:14.7195870Z   - boto: 2.49.0
2021-10-04T03:07:14.7196436Z   - cmd:7z: 16.02
2021-10-04T03:07:14.7197142Z   - cmd:annex: 8.20210903+git115-g0d664d0d3-1~ndall+1
2021-10-04T03:07:14.7197873Z   - cmd:bundled-git: 2.24.0
2021-10-04T03:07:14.7198762Z   - cmd:git: 2.24.0
2021-10-04T03:07:14.7199307Z   - cmd:system-git: 2.33.0
2021-10-04T03:07:14.7199972Z   - cmd:system-ssh: 8.2p1
2021-10-04T03:07:14.7200577Z   - humanize: 3.11.0
2021-10-04T03:07:14.7201093Z   - iso8601: 0.1.16
2021-10-04T03:07:14.7201665Z   - keyring: 23.2.1
2021-10-04T03:07:14.7202210Z   - keyrings.alt: 4.1.0
2021-10-04T03:07:14.7202841Z   - msgpack: 1.0.2
2021-10-04T03:07:14.7203459Z   - requests: 2.26.0
```
